sentences.en: The machine takes its name from its inventor.
sentences.cn: 这机器是根据发明者的姓名命名的。

sentences.en: In my youth my ambition had been to be an inventor.
sentences.cn: 在我年轻时我的抱负曾是当一名发明家。

sentences.en: The royalties enabled the inventor to re-establish himself in business.
sentences.cn: 这些使用费使这名发明者能再次立足商界。
